channel.title: Boolean process handler?
channel.description:
Hello. Is it possible to use a public boolean process handler? because this will remove alot of lagg! I need to no if it is possible? or if someone has it.
Many Thanks.
Musicmad441.

item.title: Boolean process handler?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Never said it reduced for all people, but found out my process was 30kb so now its roughly about 5kb to 9kb, so thats what reduced lag for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Boolean process handler?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Handlers don’t remove lag, so that wouldn’t help at all. The process will still be called, it wont change anything. It’ll just organize your client a bit more.

Read full topic

item.title: Boolean process handler?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:7, topic:158536”]How does calling another class to do the exact same thing, reduce lag?[/quote]I know, that doesn’t make much sense…

Read full topic

item.title: Boolean process handler?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:6, topic:158536”]Yeah thats what i said, i already have it though. Umm

make a class

start the method, name can be whatever.

public void booleanProcess(client c) {

Everything here has to be started by c. what i mean is
things that are declared in client.java

like c.sendMessage(“asdas”);
public int c.massTimer = 0;

etc

get me?

EDIT:

Let me be more clearer, everthing that you want to call in the processhandler, from client.java would be started by c.w/e here.

do it correctly, or else you will be like fucked.

Oh and btw it doesn’t remove that much lag, i guess about 20% thru 40%.[/quote]
How does calling another class to do the exact same thing, reduce lag?

Read full topic

item.title: Boolean process handler?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Yeah thats what i said, i already have it though. Umm

make a class

start the method, name can be whatever.

public void booleanProcess(client c) {

Everything here has to be started by c. what i mean is
things that are declared in client.java

like c.sendMessage(“asdas”);
public int c.massTimer = 0;

etc

get me?

EDIT:

Let me be more clearer, everthing that you want to call in the processhandler, from client.java would be started by c.w/e here.

do it correctly, or else you will be like fucked.

Oh and btw it doesn’t remove that much lag, i guess about 20% thru 40%.

Read full topic
